document.full_text: two taliban suicide bombers caused carnage on sunday at a sufi shrine in eastern pakistan, killing at least 41 people and wounding scores in the latest bloody attack on minority religious groups.
document.title: suicide blasts at sufi shrine in pakistan kill 41
lines_and_colors: two taliban suicide bombers caused carnage on sunday at a sufi shrine in eastern pakistan, killing at least 41 people and wounding scores in the latest bloody attack on minority religious groups.
